website_summaries.verdict: A fun twist on traditional Oreos that are chocolate inside and out. A great choice for Oreo lovers and chocoholics.
pros: Stands out from the classic cookie for having chocolate creme filling sandwiched between chocolate cookies
The two chocolate flavors go great together and also taste fantastic dipped in milk
cons: The creme is quite sweet, but this isn't a downside for everyone
A few consumers wish there was a bit more filling

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves These
customer_reviews.text: Watching my very trim and in shape husband inhale 3/4 of the package within 30 minutes of these arriving was hysterical. I like them too and would have left a longer review if I’d gotten more than a taste:) Yes, I’ll be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle1000

customer_reviews.title: A step above a classic oreo cookie
customer_reviews.text: These are a delicious twist on a classic oreo cookie. The normal creme is replaced with chocolate creme that takes it to the next level of deliciousness. It is not overly sweet and pairs wonderfully with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: You Know You're Getting Old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause I was craving chocolate Oreos and Wal-Mart didn't have them. They came pretty fresh and I liked them but after like two or three I was done, they were so rich. The flavor was just too much! I feel so old saying that I couldn't handle chocolate Oreos but that's how it is. Definitely great for kids though!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as a snack or used in a chocolate pie crust
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy these cookies two ways: As a snack and in a pie crust. Both ways the cookies are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Oreos
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate are my favorite. I always buy a second bag for variety and without fail wish I'd stuck with just chocolate every time. Very fresh, long lasting, delivered in a timely manner. Really disappointed that every package I seem to buy has space like there's one less cookie the past year or so but that's an Oreos thing, nothing to do with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sounded better than it tasted
customer_reviews.text: These were just okay. I honestly thought that they would taste more chocolatey, but instead, it was just like it had brown colored creme filling. Nobody was excited about these at our house, and we'll not be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: They're Oreos with chocolate cream. They're more like Double Stuf in terms of thickness. I like to refrigerate mine - I like them better when the cream is more solid. I feel so stupid leaving a review for food that's been on the market for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Peppers Forever

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate filling overpowers the outer cookie
customer_reviews.text: I love the outer Oreo crisps, but have never enjoyed the center filling that much. I ordered this chocolate version to see whether I might actually enjoy the whole cookie---but no. The chocolate filling is really sweet, and unfortunately there seems to actually be even more of it than in the standard-size Oreo (almost like a double-stuffed variety). Kids loved them, so the chocolate flavor is properly targeted to the younger set I suppose!
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Oreos
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! The cream's chocolate flavor is somewhat subtle, but still noticeable and enjoyable. I used these for my birthday ice cream cake and I had to keep myself from eating too much!
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love...
customer_reviews.text: Oreo's are one of my favorite cookies and the chocolate ones are the best, ok I like the lemon ones too and the white fudge coated ones. Heck ALL Oreo's are the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: CammyV

customer_reviews.title: Best Oreos
customer_reviews.text: These chocolate-stuffed Oreos are the best I've had, even better than the white creme filling. The main drawback is that they're addicitive.
customer_reviews.author: Mory

customer_reviews.title: Oreo Outdid Themselves!
customer_reviews.text: A great chocolate flavor. Oreo came up with a great product combining the chocolate filling with the chocolate cookie crust. This one is a real "Keeper"!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Creek

customer_reviews.title: The cookies themselves are great just dont  care for them being crumbled up
customer_reviews.text: Cookies were not protected on the bottom, so they were crumbled when someone dropped the box, no fun and kids don't like them crumbled up.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah I. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I never tried this variation on the classic sandwhich cookie ...
customer_reviews.text: I never tried this variation on the classic sandwhich cookie. It combines the classic taste of Oreo wafers with chocolate. I must admit yhat I ordeted it in error, but, I do not regret getting this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Good for Chcolate Lovers
customer_reviews.text: This chocolate filling and on top of the chocolate cookie is freaking delicious. I am a chocolate fanatic and couldn't stop eating this specific flavor. It's really good for chocolate lovers. I am a guilt chocolate lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sbeih

customer_reviews.title: Needs the filling to have that chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: There's really not a chocolate tasting just the cookie the filling taste just like the original but just a chocolate look
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Okay but I prefer original Oreos
customer_reviews.text: The filling is not as chocolaty as I hoped. I’ll stick to the original Oreos which are a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: John Bitna

customer_reviews.title: Oreo Chocolate Creme Cookies
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cookies very much. There were quite a few broken cookies in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Chocoholics delight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved oreo cookies but when the filled them with creamy chocolate they made this an even better treat for this chocoholic. They are now an item that belongs to my basic items on my shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: So Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting to try these and it was worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni A. Clancy

customer_reviews.title: New twist on an old favorite cookie
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate filling was such a fun change. SO good!

customer_reviews.title: Cookies
customer_reviews.text: Love these cookies but they crumble as soon as you pick them up

customer_reviews.title: Delicious cookies
customer_reviews.text: These chocolate cookies are tasty and easy to eat. They make a wonderful snack too.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My woman loves these. It's a chocolate lover's dream oreo.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen this in the store for awhile. Love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Far better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am a chocoholic and these were pretty good. I will be getting them again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: delicious! So much better than regular Oreos. Just don't leave the box open or they'll get stale

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They were a lil to sweet for me, but liked them
customer_reviews.author: Sassy B

customer_reviews.title: Was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the mixtures of chocolate. Chocolate filling tasted too artificial.
customer_reviews.author: LadyMae

customer_reviews.title: Good cookies
customer_reviews.text: Great oreo cookies, cant get the chocolate, chocolate in stores
customer_reviews.author: Karie Hackler

customer_reviews.title: Good Oreo. Who doesn't love more chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Good Oreo. Who doesn't love more chocolate? Only thing that could be improved is if these were the peanut butter versions...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these cookies
customer_reviews.text: Im a big fan of chocolate, love these cookies, the price is right, compared to the supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Albright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portion Size
customer_reviews.text: These are great, not only to take on the go, but to portion out as well. I am a huge orea lover, but I find that it is much easier to limit myself to one package containing six cookies than if I were to try to limit myself to six cookies from a large package.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN MEXICO...UGH
customer_reviews.text: Cookie the same, but rating is because it's made in Mexico putting Americans out of work..
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: Built-in portion control!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit it: I'm a sucker for Oreos. They're one of my favorite cookies, and it's all too easy for me to over indulge. That's where these single-serve packs come in handy. Each one contains 6 cookies. I store them in my "auxiliary pantry" out of the way, and bring in only one pack at a time. I get my Oreo fix and I'm not tempted to overdo it. I think the price I paid is decent -- a bit more than the supermarket, but I can have these delivered to my home, so there's that. Definitely will purchase again as long as the price stays reasonable. They are, after all, Oreos!
customer_reviews.author: L. MountfordTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: YOU ORDER IT AND IT'S THERE IN A BLINK OF AN EYE HA HA!
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Love Prime Pantry!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Oreos for my son away in college. He loved receiving them and I was impressed with the price. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: chocolate filled Oreos for all your chocolate cravings
customer_reviews.text: I can never get enough chocolate. If you are like me, and you love a lot of chocolate, these will sure hit the spot. The resealable package is handy, but face it--you aren't going to need it! These will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: jeanneserenity

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the snack size for the convenience of taking them to lunch. I was worried about the shelf life but when these arrived, I found they were fresh and not stale. A few were broken but most were in tact. I hope they have the golden in this size.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love me some chocolate & these are soo good!

customer_reviews.title: Have never liked the double stuffed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize these were chocolate. I'm an 'original' oreo fan. Have never liked the double stuffed, green stuffed, pink stuffed, etc. But these (while not as good as the originals) were yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Great travel size for Oreos. You can take them with you and they are always fresh. If you do not eat a large package fast enough they tend to get stale; thankfully that does not happen when there are only 6 to a pack.
customer_reviews.author: auto1125

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, and I learned that these separate portions ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, and I learned that these separate portions is the best way to buy them, for freshness over a period of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bradman

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! I don't like the white filling so I never buy Oreos. I decided to give these with chocolate filling a try and I'm glad that I did. They're currently my favorite cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! This is so great to have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! This is so great to have a quick oreo fix!! Carry them in your lunch, in your pocketbook, in your pocket! They are so convenient, and the price is well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W. Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookies
customer_reviews.text: My son has enjoyed them as snacks in the after noon and at night after meals. He especially liked the creamy centers.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: 25 cents per pack is a good deal for an afternoon snack. 6 cookies per pack is enough to satisfy me. Single serving packs don't go stale like the bigger packages.
customer_reviews.author: l2Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste
customer_reviews.text: These cookies taste great and arrived fresh. Difficult to find these in local stores. None were broken or smashed in the packaging. Decent price as well.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I threw these out as I ordered the wrong kind. I didn't realize they were chocolate-filled. My mistake.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal at the time I purchased them.
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought double stuffed, kids got sick of so many plain packages but are still eating them as school snacks. They were a heck of a deal so I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: lisa remmick

customer_reviews.title: Who knew I would love these more than the original

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice way to get the cookies, also makes it easy to take with you. Just the right amount. Very affordable.

customer_reviews.title: We liked them
customer_reviews.text: Very good packaging and crispness of the cookies. We took them on a flight for snacking and also lunch packs for work and school.

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular Oreos

customer_reviews.title: Great Oreo fix on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great Oreo fix on the go. Also great for portion control - I can't be the only one to eat the entire bag once it is open...

customer_reviews.title: I think because the best by date was rapidly approaching

product_meta.title: OREO Chocolate Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, 15.25 oz
product_meta.description:
OREO Chocolate Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies are the classic OREO cookies you’ve always loved, but with even more chocolatey goodness. These chocolate cookies are filled with a rich chocolate creme, making them supremely dunkable. Chocolate OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk. They also make great sweet snacks for school, lunch or home. The resealable package with easy-pull tab keeps chocolate sandwich cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :7.8 x 6 x 1.5 inches; 1 Pounds
 * Item model number :004400002529
 * Date First Available :November 2, 2011
 * Manufacturer :100 Calorie Packs
 * ASIN :B0062Q4NCW

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars468 ratings OREO Chocolate Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies are the classic OREO cookies you’ve always loved, but with even more chocolatey goodness. These chocolate cookies are filled with a rich chocolate creme, making them supremely dunkable. Chocolate OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk. They also make great sweet snacks for school, lunch or home. The resealable package with easy-pull tab keeps chocolate sandwich cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.
feature_bullets: One 15.25 oz package of OREO Chocolate Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies
Chocolate wafers filled with chocolate creme
Sweet snacks perfect for parties and events
Kosher cookies always made with real cocoa
